title: Can't Move Bug.
body: I don't know about the recent patch yesterday since I haven't played since then yet but in the patch where Bard was released I ran into a problem where sometimes I would be unable to move in the game. I could use abilities but I couldn't level them up if I had the points for it. Abilities that made my champion move worked and I would move to where the ability would put me but I would be unable to move after that. This went away after about 5 minutes but has anyone else experienced this or was it just me?

replies.body:
Did your right click also have a red click or green? Are you on a Mac or PC? Do you remember pressing any key when it occured.
E.G Pressing shift to talk in ALL chat? It seems to be happening to a few people.
Is this recurring? Do you know specifically what triggers it?
Nope, it just did it randomly. But don't have it anymore.

Well, it might just be a one-off bug then. Is your internet connection usually stable? Maybe the game, for that particular game, failed to download move commands and thus, you weren't able to issue move commands to your champion until it refreshed.
